attributes.action: Force EasyJet to give automatic refunds on cancelled flights.
attributes.additional_details: Force EasyJet to refund people. It is impossible to seek a refund. It is so obvious that they are making the process of refunding money as difficult as possible.
attributes.background: If EasyJet cancel a flight they should automatically refund the card from where the payment was taken.

rejection.details:
Arrangements for refunding, changing or rebooking travel are a matter for individual airlines and travel agents, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to create a fund to reimburse money lost due to covid-19 travel cancellations, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304912

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
